articles.content: During England's tour of India in 2021, the two teams played in five T20Is at the Narendra Modi Stadium in Ahmedabad. Shardul Thakur was the standout star of India's series win with 8 wickets in five… [+8 chars]

articles.title: IPL 2024: Ravichandran Ashwin names the replacement of Ambati Rayudu at CSK - Cricket Times
articles.description: Ravichandran Ashwin has picked the replacement of Ambati Rayudu at Chennai Super Kings. The IPL 2024 auction is scheduled for December 19 in Dubai.
articles.content: The much-anticipated Indian Premier League (IPL) 2024 auction is scheduled for December 19 in Dubai, with a staggering 1166 players registering for the bidding extravaganza. Among the 10 franchises, … [+2293 chars]
